title: Capture The Flag
description: Participants need to find flags hidden in software. The team with the most points after collecting all flags wins!

title: Exoplanet Hunt
description: Astronomy is not just about gazing at the stars! This event is an SQL based competition to identify habitable exoplanets from a plethora of ones!

title: Escape Room
description: Multiple levels which will have problem statements that the participant would be expected to solve in order to progress through the game.

title: Tech Quiz
description: A General quiz with special rounds for tech specific questions

title: The Chess Bot Challenge
description: A contest designed for developers and chess enthusiasts to showcase their programming skills and strategic thinking
